RegistrationEmail.Subject: [PhiZone] Please confirm your email address
RegistrationEmail.Body:
Dear {UserName}:

You created an account on PhiZone just now.

Please enter {Code} into the input field on the confirmation page in order to confirm your email address. This code is valid in 5 minutes.

If you did not expect to receive this email, please ignore it.

PhiZone
